<link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;747aa2cf.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Do you know people who currently have children in an elementary school in a<br>country other than the US and the UK? Do you study elementary school<br>practices? I am collecting recess practices around the world and would<br>welcome your input. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-10T10:06:33-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Beresin, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;747aa2cf.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;355eae17.1502">   <title>Apologies </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;355eae17.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Apologies to all for my last email to this list, which was intended for<br>Julia. Note to self: take more care with listserve replies in future. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T10:30:27-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tim Gill</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;355eae17.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;c690dff3.1502">   <title>Re: The Lives and Legacies of Iona and Peter Opie article </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;c690dff3.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Oops that's what comes of not reading all the unopened emails in my inbox.<br>I've successfully downloaded your paper now!<br>Tim<br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: The Children's Folklore Mailing List [mailto:CHILDLORE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK]<br>On Behalf Of bishop julia<br>Sent: 04 February 2015 09:59<br>To: CHILDLORE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: The Lives and Legacies of Iona and Peter Opie article [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T10:26:09-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tim Gill</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;c690dff3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f2271c3d.1502">   <title>The Lives and Legacies of Iona and Peter Opie article </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f2271c3d.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Following on from my recent email about the special issue of the *International<br>Journal of Play*, I am very happy to share the link to an author eprint of<br>my own article about the Opies' lives and work. I believe there are still<br>some free downloads of it available via the link, but it's on [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T09:58:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f2271c3d.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;6226b6d7.1502">   <title>Special issue of IJP now published on the lives and legacy of Iona and Peter Opie </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;6226b6d7.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>We am delighted to inform you that a special issue of the *International<br>Journal of Play* entitled 'Lifework and Legacy: Reviewing Iona and Peter<br>Opie's Contribution to the Study of Play' has just been published. Many<br>members of this list have contributed to the special issue and we<br>gratefully acknowledge the work of everyone involved. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T09:53:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;6226b6d7.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e8f3525.1502">   <title>Information for Canadian documentary on skipping games </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e8f3525.1502</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>I have been contacted by a Canadian documentary producer who is interested in skipping games. i'm sure that members of the childlore list will have some answers for her. I will pass them on but her email address is also below.<br>Kathy Marsh [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T20:21:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kathryn Marsh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e8f3525.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;d7cf46d0.1501">   <title>Coy me nero etc </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;d7cf46d0.1501</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>I learnt this from my aunt Marion Skerrett probably in the middle or late<br>'forties in Dublin. She sang it as the chorus to A Frog He Would a' Wooing<br>go and it went as follows: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-15T10:08:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Richard Skerrett</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;d7cf46d0.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;56c2106e.1501">   <title>Fwd: CfP: Boyhood Studies: An Interdisciplinary Journal </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;56c2106e.1501</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear All, This sounds like an interesting new venture. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-07T09:15:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;56c2106e.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;4f38b38b.1412">   <title>Tradition Today 4 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;4f38b38b.1412</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>The Centre for English Traditional Heritage is pleased to announce: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-14T18:39:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Janet E Alton</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;4f38b38b.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;bd1bbd2.1410">   <title>Fwd: 3 x ESRC PhD studentships in contemporary childhoods at Cardiff SOCSI </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;bd1bbd2.1410</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear All, Please publicise these interesting opportunities.<br><br>Best wishes, Julia<br>---------- Forwarded message ----------<br>From: Peter Hemming &lt;HemmingPJ@cardiff.ac.uk&gt;<br>Date: 27 October 2014 12:01<br>Subject: 3 x ESRC PhD studentships in contemporary childhoods at Cardiff<br>SOCSI<br>To: CHILD-YOUTH-GEOSOCIAL-ENV@jiscmail.ac.uk [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-27T12:20:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;bd1bbd2.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f820b52b.1410">   <title>Re: Cup Game follow up </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f820b52b.1410</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>HI Julia,<br><br>There is information on Sansa Kroma, including the stone passing patterns<br>in the following publication: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-06T10:57:44+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kathryn Marsh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;f820b52b.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;628283a9.1410">   <title>Cup Game follow up </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;628283a9.1410</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Hello All,<br><br>I've been looking at YouTube clips of Ghanaian children's play as part of<br>the Exploring Play MOOC that the University of Sheffield is running at the<br>moment (see my previous email if you're interested in signing up - it's not<br>too late!). And I came across this song, Sansa Kroma. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-06T10:57:00+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;628283a9.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;b46c6126.1410">   <title>CfP: Wonderlands: Reading/ Writing/ Telling Fairy Tales and Fantasy </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;b46c6126.1410</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear colleagues,<br><br>On 23 May 2015 the Sussex Centre for Folklore, Fairy Tales and Fantasy will<br>host a PGR Symposium entitled &quot;Wonderlands: Reading/Writing/Telling Fairy<br>Tales and Fantasy.&quot; Timed to coincide with the 150th anniversary of *Alice\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds<br>Adventures in Wonderland*, this event is primarily aimed at postgraduate<br>students and early career researchers, although other scholars and the<br>general [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-03T13:30:01+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Joanna Coleman</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;b46c6126.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;db8c2cca.1409">   <title>Free course on Exploring Play starts next week! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;db8c2cca.1409</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdExploring Play: the Importance of Play in Everyday Life<br>&lt;https://www.futurelearn.com/partners/the-university-of-sheffield&gt;\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd is a<br>free, open, online course developed by the University of Sheffield. It<br>begins this coming Monday, 29th September 2014, and runs for 7 weeks. It is<br>being delivered through the FutureLearn platform. The course aims to<br>investigate play as a serious subject for study [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-26T00:15:55+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;db8c2cca.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;a765f4ac.1409">   <title>Tenure-track position in Children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Literature at the University of Pittsburgh</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;a765f4ac.1409</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear all,<br><br>Apologies for cross-posting. The University of Pittsburgh Department of English is hiring in children's literature. The details are below. We are an interdisciplinary program in a large and diverse English department, and we would certainly welcome applications from scholars who take a folkloristic and/or ethnographic approach to children's literature and culture. More information about our [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-14T23:45:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bickford, Tyler</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;a765f4ac.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;755b05dc.1407">   <title>Fwd: Support Play Wales - campaign update / Cefnogwch Chwarae Cymru - y diweddaraf ar yr ymgyrch </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;755b05dc.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear All, Please see below and sign the petition if you feel able to. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-16T13:51:09+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;755b05dc.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e807ea0e.1407">   <title>Fwd: H-Folk: CFP: PLAYTHINGS IN EARLY MODERNITY: PARTY GAMES, WORD GAMES, MIND GAMES (edited collection) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e807ea0e.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This looks like a fascinating volume to which some list members may be<br>interested in contributing. Please do circulate the call to others who may<br>be interested too. This field is such an interdisciplinary one. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T12:47:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;e807ea0e.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;32164053.1407">   <title>Re: information about Davy Crockett </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;32164053.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Yes Julia, it would have been in the late 1950s, as television didn't<br>come to Australia until September 1956. Cheers, Judy [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T14:57:07+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>jmckinty</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;32164053.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;8fb77392.1407">   <title>Re: information about Davy Crockett </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;8fb77392.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Hi Judy,<br><br>Many thanks for pitching in your memories. It is excellent to have<br>confirmation that the Davy Crockett phenomenon was alive and well in<br>Australia. Was this around the later 1950s? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-05T22:42:47+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>bishop julia</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;8fb77392.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;3fdeee68.1407">   <title>Re: information about Davy Crockett </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;3fdeee68.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Hi Julia,<br>I watched Fess Parker as Davy Crockett on television as a child, and can<br>still sing the theme song (well, the first verse anyway). I grew up in<br>Ballarat, Australia, and remember how my brother and I frantically<br>collected icypole wrappers, so we could have enough to send away for a<br>'real' Davy Crockett coonskin [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-05T10:10:52+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>jmckinty</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;3fdeee68.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;3292a0d2.1407">   <title>Re: information about Davy Crockett </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDLORE;3292a0d2.1407</link>   <description> **Please note that if you press the Reply button to respond to this mailing, it will be distributed to everyone on the Childlore List. If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Thanks, John, for relaying this vivid account, and thanks to your wife for<br>her recollections! It's fascinating to hear about the home-made costume -<br>the hat sounds better than Davy Crockett's own! If you want to make a personal reply, you will need to modify the Reply-To line of your message.**<br><br>Hello Julia,<br><br>Re Davy Crockett<br><br>My wife tells me that following the Davy Crockett film release she spent at<br>least two years of her early childhood immersed in the re-living of Davy<br>Crockett in rural Worcestershire. She wore a home made version (fashioned<br>from a redundant fox-fur complete with head) of the famous raccoon hat.
